content.p: The University is committed to addressing todayâ€™s global challenges and is funding six new Beacons of Excellence to champion our field-leading response to these key challenges. SHAping Sustainable Futures Hub is an online research hub aiming to demonstrate how social science research at the University of Nottingham is helping to shape a more sustainable future. Other research areas driving innovation within the fields of environment and sustainability include: During COP26 and COP27, the annual UN conferences on climate change, the university has highlighted how our research and work tackle key environmental issues and help policymakers and partners accelerate change. Estate Office, University Park, Nottingham, NG7 2RD Email: sustainability@nottingham.ac.uk
